entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing rain or flurries changing to 60 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 10:14 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 10:14 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:14 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
